text: The Cut is a 2014 German French Polish Turkish Canadian Russian Italian Jordanian drama movie directed by Fatih Akin and starring Tahar Rahim, Simon Abkarian, Makram Khoury, Hindi Zahra, Kevork Malikyan, Bartu Küçükçağlayan. == Other websites == * Category:2014 drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Polish drama movies Category:Turkish movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Jordanian movies Category:Movies directed by Fatih Akin
title: The Cut (2014 movie)
